private_settings.name: account_identifier_hull
private_settings.title: The attribute to uniquely identify an account in Hull

private_settings.name: account_identifier_service
private_settings.title: The field to uniquely identify a Account in Outreach.io

private_settings.name: synchronized_account_segments_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
The below lists of segments are whitelists for accounts. You need to *explicitely specify one or more segments* for which accounts and events shall be sent to Outreach.io.
If you do not specify any segment, no account or event will be sent to Outreach.io.
private_settings.title: Whitelisted Segments

private_settings.name: synchronized_account_segments
private_settings.title: Account Filter
private_settings.description: Send *Accounts* as Accounts to Outreach.io when belonging to one of these segments

private_settings.name: account_attributes_inbound
private_settings.title: List of Account fields to fetch from Outreach.io

private_settings.name: account_attributes_outbound
private_settings.title: Send Account Attributes to Outreach.io
private_settings.description: Name and domain are sent automatically

private_settings.name: synchronized_user_segments_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
The above lists of segments are whitelists for users. You need to *explicitely specify one or more segments* for which users and events shall be sent to Outreach.io.
If you do not specify any segment, no users or event will be sent to Outreach.io.
private_settings.title: Whitelisted Segments

private_settings.name: synchronized_user_segments
private_settings.title: User Filter
private_settings.description: Send *Users* as Prospects to Outreach.io when belonging to one of these segments

private_settings.name: prospect_attributes_inbound
private_settings.title: List of Prospect fields to fetch from Outreach.io
